meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by myxedema.
meanings.sent1: The myxedemic patient had swollen skin due to myxedema.
meanings.sent2: Her myxedemic condition made her skin appear puffy.
meanings.sent3: The myxedemic teddy bear looked like it had a fluffy coat of fur.
meanings.sent4: The myxedemic clouds hung low in the sky, heavy with moisture.
meanings.sent5: The myxedemic appearance of the landscape after the rain was striking.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or exhibiting symptoms of myxedema.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with a myxedemic condition due to her symptoms.
meanings.sent2: He displayed myxedemic features such as puffiness and swelling.
meanings.sent3: The myxedemic puppy waddled around with a chubby belly.
meanings.sent4: Her myxedemic state of mind made her feel sluggish and tired.
meanings.sent5: The myxedemic look of the old building gave it a tired and worn-out appearance.
